bibl.title: Fragments of Three Umayyad Official Documents.
bibl.note: 1. Österreichische Nationalbibliothek, Vienna. Pap. Vindob. A.P. 6672. Eleven fragments of the Arabic correspondence of the governor Qurra b. Šarīk. Aphrodito, 709-710. - 2. Bodleian Library, Oxford. Pap. Bodl. MS. Arab. d. 92 (P). Arabic protocol issued in the name of ‘Ubayd Allāh b. al-Ḥabḥāb, 728-734. - 3. Bodleian Library, Oxford. Pap. Bodl. MS. Copt. b. 7 (P) verso [sic, lire: recto]. Letter addressed to al-Qāsim b. ‘Ubayd Allāh. Dayr al-Bala'izah, 734-742.

bibl.title: The Heritage of Islamic Learning. Studies Presented to Wadad Kadi

bibl.seg: 141.8 P. Bodl. Ms.Arab. d. 92 (P) P. Bodl. Ms.Copt. b. 7 (P) recto P. Vindob. Inv. A.P. 6672
Fred Donner, Fragments of Three Umayyad Official Documents.

Maurice A. Pomerantz & Aram A. Shahin (edd.), The Heritage of Islamic Learning. Studies Presented to Wadad Kadi = Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts. 122 (Leiden, 2015) pp. 28-41, 4 figg.

1. Österreichische Nationalbibliothek, Vienna. Pap. Vindob. A.P. 6672. Eleven fragments of the Arabic correspondence of the governor Qurra b. Šarīk. Aphrodito, 709-710. - 2. Bodleian Library, Oxford. Pap. Bodl. MS. Arab. d. 92 (P). Arabic protocol issued in the name of ‘Ubayd Allāh b. al-Ḥabḥāb, 728-734. - 3. Bodleian Library, Oxford. Pap. Bodl. MS. Copt. b. 7 (P) verso [sic, lire: recto]. Letter addressed to al-Qāsim b. ‘Ubayd Allāh. Dayr al-Bala'izah, 734-742.
